name: Gaming Mouse
description: Ergonomic design with customizable buttons, RGB lighting, and a high-precision sensor for gaming enthusiasts.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: Durable mechanical switches with customizable keycaps, RGB backlighting, and a detachable wrist rest.

name: Gaming Headset
description: Comfortable over-ear design with noise-canceling microphone, surround sound, and adjustable headband.

name: External Hard Drive
description: Portable and reliable storage with 1TB capacity, USB 3.0 interface, and shock-resistant design.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Compact and lightweight wireless mouse with smooth tracking, long battery life, and ergonomic grip.

name: Laptop Cooling Pad
description: High-performance cooling pad with adjustable fan speed, ergonomic design, and built-in USB hub.

name: USB-C Hub
description: Multi-port USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0, SD card reader, and charging port for all your connectivity needs.

name: Webcam
description: HD webcam with built-in microphone, autofocus, and adjustable clip for clear video calls and streaming.

name: Wireless Charger
description: Fast wireless charger with Qi compatibility, slim design, and LED indicator for convenient charging.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful sound, water-resistant design, and long battery life.
